Class Algebra

  • public class Algebra
extends java.lang.Object
    Used for solving system of linear equations
    Author:
    jackyliao123

      static Rational[] solve(int unknowns, char[] unknownc, java.lang.String[] lines)

    • Method Detail

      • solve

        public static Rational[] solve(int unknowns,
               char[] unknownc,
               java.lang.String[] lines)
        Solves the given system of linear equations
        Parameters:
        unknowns - the number of unknown characters in the system of equations
        unknownc - all the unknown characters in the equations
        lines - every equation in the system of equations
        Returns:
        the key to the equations
        Throws:
        ParserException - when the equations cannot be parsed
        InfiniteSolutionException - when there are infinite solutions to these equations
        NoSolutionException - when there is no solution found for these equations
